ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Decipher strange symbols
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deciphers some of the materials language to make further research possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Probe occult deities
ResearchProjectDef.description: Repeatable research to discover occult deities to worship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Study successful cults
ResearchProjectDef.description: Repeatable research to improve the researcher's cult mindedness and social skills during the research process.\n\nThis research is recommended for pawns looking to become preachers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Ritual Attire
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the design and creation of occult robes, hoods, and various masks. Wearing proper clothing increases chances of successful sacrifices.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Sculptures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the design and creation of occult sculptures dedicated to otherworldly entities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Obelisk Construction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the design and construction of occult obelisks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Altar
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of an altar of worship to conduct rituals for beings beyond this world.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Altar of Sacrifice
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to upgrade an altar to an altar of sacrifice to show greater appreciation of extradimensional beings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [Occult] Human Sacrifice
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to upgrade an altar to an altar of human sacrifice, allowing for impressive benefits from cosmic entities.
